Comments_List: Basic overview of Pharmacology; roughly equivalent to parts of my first year undergrad pharm course at Cambridge
I learned various aspects of the field of pharmacology as I had never taken a pharma course before.
Excellent topics. Some lectures better than others

Strengths; the initial intro on pharmacokintics / dynamics especially was good, and informative for the people who hadn't taken pharm before. 
Weaknesses; some exams seem based mostly on memorisation of drugs, graphs and basic facts as opposed to understanding of the material
The lectures varied quite a bit, some were interesting and others not so much.
Yes. Good intro to pharm for people who haven't taken it before, good refresher for people who have
Yes this class was a good introduction to pharmacology.
Yes but I would warn them about how significantly the level of difficultly the exams are. For each exam, we needed to know much  more material than the previous one (each exam is not cumulative)
Yes absolutely. Broad knowledge of pharmacology
